productComments.commentText:
Did someone say leftovers and live music?

Knowing you need to recover from the feast (and family) of Christmas Day, so they are bringing back the legendary Craic Fest on St. Stephen's Day. Featuring live sets from Steve Byrne, The Gathering & Tales of Strangers.

残り物とライブミュージック、って誰か言ってた？

クリスマスの祝宴（と家族）から立ち直る必要があるってこと。だから、聖ステファノの日に伝説のCraic Festが復活します。Steve Byrne、The Gathering、Tales of Strangersによるライブセットをフィーチャー。

Qualcuno ha parlato di avanzi e musica dal vivo?

Sapendo di aver bisogno di riprendersi dalla festa (e dalla famiglia) del giorno di Natale, torna il leggendario Craic Fest il giorno di Santo Stefano. Con esibizioni dal vivo di Steve Byrne, The Gathering e Tales of Strangers.

Hat da jemand „Essensreste und Live-Musik“ gesagt?

Da wir wissen, dass ihr euch vom Weihnachtsfest (und der Familie) erholen müsst, gibt es am zweiten Weihnachtsfeiertag wieder das legendäre Craic Fest. Mit Live-Auftritten von Steve Byrne, The Gathering und Tales of Strangers.

Ada yang bilang sisa makanan dan musik live?

Karena kamu perlu memulihkan diri setelah pesta (dan keluarga) di Hari Natal, mereka akan kembali menghadirkan Craic Fest yang legendaris di Hari St. Stephen. Menampilkan penampilan live dari Steve Byrne, The Gathering & Tales of Strangers.

有人说想吃剩菜和听现场音乐吗？

他们知道你需要从圣诞节的盛宴（和家人）中恢复过来，所以将在圣斯蒂芬节（12月26日）重现传奇的Craic Fest音乐节。届时将有Steve Byrne、The Gathering和Tales of Strangers乐队的现场演出。

Alguém falou em sobras e música ao vivo?

Sabendo que você precisa se recuperar da ceia (e da família) do Natal, eles estão trazendo de volta o lendário Craic Fest no dia de Santo Estêvão. Com apresentações ao vivo de Steve Byrne, The Gathering e Tales of Strangers.

Des restes de Noël et de la musique en direct ça vous tente ?

Pour vous remettre des festins (et des réunions de famille) de Noël, le légendaire Craic Fest fait son grand retour le lendemain de Noël. Au programme : les concerts de Steve Byrne, The Gathering et Tales of Strangers.

¿Alguien dijo comida casera y música en vivo?

Sabemos que necesitas recuperarte del festín (y la familia) de Navidad, así que regresa el legendario Craic Fest el día de San Esteban. Con actuaciones en vivo de Steve Byrne, The Gathering y Tales of Strangers.

누가 남은 음식과 라이브 음악이라고 했던가요?

크리스마스 잔치(그리고 가족)의 피로를 풀고 싶다면 성 스티븐 데이에 전설적인 Craic Fest를 다시 선보입니다. Steve Byrne, The Gathering, Tales of Strangers의 라이브 공연을 만나보세요.

有人說想吃剩菜聽現場音樂嗎？

他們知道你需要從聖誕節的盛宴（和家人）中恢復過來，所以將在聖斯蒂芬節（12月26日）重現傳奇的Craic Fest音樂節。屆時將有Steve Byrne、The Gathering和Tales of Strangers樂團的現場演出。

_source.productDescription:
Sunshine. Style. Boxing Day Racing. Gather the crew for one of Queensland's most iconic summer traditions at the Sunshine Coast Turf Club. 

Whether reuniting with family, hosting mates, or just enjoying a summer raceday, the day is sorted. Off-Track Entertainment General Admission and Membership is great value and includes everything needed for a fun-filled day: Free Pickleball in The Avenue. Family Fun Zone – inflatables, hobby horse challenge and lawn games by Karizmatik. 

Bars and bites across the course. Free shuttle to Caloundra RSL after the last race. 

From reserved venues to trackside lawn, SCTC makes hosting a no-brainer. Racing tradition. Summer celebration. Unforgettable atmosphere.
_source.productShortDescription: Sunshine. Style. Boxing Day Racing. Gather your crew for one of Queensland's most iconic summer traditions at the Sunshine Coast Turf Club.

productComments.commentText:
Sunshine. Style. Boxing Day Racing. Gather the crew for one of Queensland's most iconic summer traditions at the Sunshine Coast Turf Club. 

Whether reuniting with family, hosting mates, or just enjoying a summer raceday, the day is sorted. Off-Track Entertainment General Admission and Membership is great value and includes everything needed for a fun-filled day: Free Pickleball in The Avenue. Family Fun Zone – inflatables, hobby horse challenge and lawn games by Karizmatik. 

Bars and bites across the course. Free shuttle to Caloundra RSL after the last race. 

From reserved venues to trackside lawn, SCTC makes hosting a no-brainer. Racing tradition. Summer celebration. Unforgettable atmosphere.

Sonnenschein. Stil. Rennsport am zweiten Weihnachtsfeiertag. Versammeln Sie Ihre Mannschaft zu einer der bekanntesten Sommertraditionen Queenslands im Sunshine Coast Turf Club.

Ob Sie sich mit der Familie treffen, Freunde einladen oder einfach nur einen sommerlichen Renntag genießen – der Tag ist perfekt. Unterhaltung abseits der Rennstrecke: Der allgemeine Eintritt und die Mitgliedschaft sind günstig und beinhalten alles, was Sie für einen erlebnisreichen Tag brauchen: Kostenloses Pickleball in der Avenue. Familien-Fun-Zone – Hüpfburgen, Steckenpferd-Challenge und Rasenspiele von Karizmatik.

Bars und Snacks entlang der Strecke. Kostenloser Shuttle zum Caloundra RSL nach dem letzten Rennen.

Von reservierten Plätzen bis hin zum Rasen an der Rennstrecke – der SCTC macht das Ausrichten zum Kinderspiel. Renntradition. Sommerfest. Unvergessliche Atmosphäre.

Sole. Stile. Gare del Boxing Day. Raduna l'equipaggio per una delle tradizioni estive più iconiche del Queensland al Sunshine Coast Turf Club.

Che si tratti di riunirsi con la famiglia, ospitare gli amici o semplicemente godersi una giornata di gare estive, la giornata è organizzata. L'ingresso generale e la tessera per l'intrattenimento fuori pista sono convenienti e includono tutto il necessario per una giornata piena di divertimento: Pickleball gratuito in The Avenue. Area Divertimento per Famiglie: gonfiabili, sfida con i cavalli da tiro e giochi sul prato di Karizmatik.

Bar e spuntini lungo il percorso. Navetta gratuita per il Caloundra RSL dopo l'ultima gara.

Dai luoghi riservati al prato a bordo pista, SCTC rende l'organizzazione un gioco da ragazzi. Tradizione ippica. Festa estiva. Atmosfera indimenticabile.

Sol. Estilo. Carreras del Boxing Day. Reúne a tu equipo para una de las tradiciones veraniegas más emblemáticas de Queensland en el Sunshine Coast Turf Club.

Ya sea para reunirse con la familia, recibir amigos o simplemente disfrutar de una carrera de verano, el día está cubierto. Entretenimiento fuera de pista: la entrada general y la membresía tienen un precio excelente e incluyen todo lo necesario para un día lleno de diversión: Pickleball gratis en The Avenue. Zona de diversión familiar: inflables, desafío de caballos de juguete y juegos de césped de Karizmatik.

Bares y bocadillos en todo el circuito. Transporte gratuito a Caloundra RSL después de la última carrera.

Desde lugares reservados hasta césped junto a la pista, SCTC hace que ser anfitrión sea pan comido. Tradición de carreras. Celebración de verano. Ambiente inolvidable.

Sol. Estilo. Corrida no Boxing Day. Reúna a equipe para uma das tradições de verão mais icônicas de Queensland no Sunshine Coast Turf Club.

Seja para reunir a família, receber amigos ou simplesmente curtir um dia de corrida de verão, o dia está garantido. O ingresso geral e a associação para entretenimento fora da pista têm um ótimo custo-benefício e incluem tudo o que você precisa para um dia cheio de diversão: Pickleball grátis na The Avenue. Zona de diversão para a família – infláveis, desafio de cavalos de pau e jogos de gramado da Karizmatik.

Bares e petiscos ao longo do percurso. Transporte gratuito para Caloundra RSL após a última corrida.

De locais reservados a gramados à beira da pista, o SCTC torna a hospedagem uma escolha óbvia. Tradição de corrida. Celebração de verão. Atmosfera inesquecível.

햇살. 스타일. 박싱 데이 레이싱. 퀸즐랜드에서 가장 상징적인 여름 전통 중 하나인 선샤인 코스트 터프 클럽에서 함께 즐겨보세요.

가족과 재회하든 친구를 초대하든 아니면 여름 경마를 즐기든 하루는 완벽하게 준비되었습니다. 오프트랙 엔터테인먼트 일반 입장권과 멤버십은 훌륭한 가치를 제공하며 즐거움으로 가득한 하루를 위한 모든 것을 포함합니다. 디 애비뉴에서 무료 피클볼 가족 놀이 공간 - 풍선 놀이기구 취미 승마 대회 카리즈마틱의 잔디밭 게임 등 다양한 즐길 거리가 있습니다.

코스 곳곳에 바와 간단한 식사 공간이 마련되어 있습니다. 마지막 경주 후 칼론드라 RSL까지 무료 셔틀버스가 운행됩니다.

예약된 장소부터 트랙 옆 잔디밭까지, SCTC는 경마를 주최하는 것을 망설임 없이 만들어줍니다. 전통 경마. 여름 축제. 잊지 못할 분위기.

Sinar mentari. Gaya. Balapan Boxing Day. Kumpulkan kru untuk salah satu tradisi musim panas paling ikonis di Queensland di Sunshine Coast Turf Club.

Baik berkumpul bersama keluarga, menjamu teman, atau sekadar menikmati hari balapan musim panas, hari itu sudah ditentukan. Tiket Masuk Umum dan Keanggotaan Hiburan Off-Track sangat terjangkau dan mencakup semua yang dibutuhkan untuk hari yang menyenangkan: Pickleball Gratis di The Avenue. Zona Kesenangan Keluarga – wahana tiup, tantangan kuda hobi, dan permainan di lapangan rumput oleh Karizmatik.

Bar dan makanan ringan di sepanjang lintasan. Antar-jemput gratis ke Caloundra RSL setelah balapan terakhir.

Dari tempat yang dipesan khusus hingga lapangan rumput di tepi lintasan, SCTC menjadikan penyelenggaraan acara ini mudah. Tradisi balapan. Perayaan musim panas. Suasana yang tak terlupakan.

Soleil. Style. Courses du lendemain de Noël. Rassemblez toute l'équipe pour l'une des traditions estivales les plus emblématiques du Queensland au Sunshine Coast Turf Club.

Que vous retrouviez votre famille, receviez des amis ou profitiez simplement d'une journée de course estivale, la journée est organisée. L'entrée générale et l'adhésion aux divertissements hors piste sont très avantageuses et comprennent tout le nécessaire pour une journée bien remplie : Pickleball gratuit à The Avenue, Zone de loisirs familiale : structures gonflables, défi de chevaux de bataille et jeux de pelouse par Karizmatik.

Bars et restauration sur le parcours. Navette gratuite pour Caloundra RSL après la dernière course.

Des emplacements réservés à la pelouse en bord de piste, le SCTC fait de l'organisation d'événements une évidence. Une tradition de course. Une fête estivale. Une ambiance inoubliable.

陽光。時尚。節禮日賽馬。在陽光海岸賽馬俱樂部 (SCTC) 歡聚一堂，參加昆士蘭最具代表性的夏季傳統活動之一。

無論是與家人團聚、招待朋友，還是只是享受夏日賽馬日，這都是一個完美的選擇。場外娛樂普通門票和會員資格物超所值，包含充滿樂趣的一天所需的一切：在 The Avenue 免費打匹克球。家庭娛樂區－充氣玩具、趣味馬挑戰賽和 Karizmatik 草坪遊戲。

賽道各處遍布酒吧和小吃。最後一場比賽結束後，提供前往卡倫德拉皇家足球聯賽 (Caloundra RSL) 的免費接駁車。

從預訂場地到賽道邊的草坪，SCTC 讓舉辦活動變得輕而易舉。賽馬傳統。夏日慶典。令人難忘的氛圍。

阳光。时尚。节礼日赛马。在阳光海岸赛马俱乐部 (SCTC) 欢聚一堂，参加昆士兰最具标志性的夏季传统活动之一。

无论是与家人团聚、招待朋友，还是仅仅享受夏日赛马日，这都是一个完美的选择。场外娱乐普通门票和会员资格物超所值，包含充满乐趣的一天所需的一切：在 The Avenue 免费打匹克球。家庭娱乐区——充气玩具、趣味马挑战赛和 Karizmatik 草坪游戏。

赛道各处遍布酒吧和小吃。最后一场比赛结束后，提供前往卡伦德拉皇家足球联赛 (Caloundra RSL) 的免费班车。

从预订场地到赛道边的草坪，SCTC 让举办活动变得轻而易举。赛马传统。夏日庆典。令人难忘的氛围。

太陽の光。スタイリッシュ。ボクシングデー・レーシング。クイーンズランド州で最も象徴的な夏の風物詩、サンシャインコースト・ターフクラブで、仲間たちと競馬を楽しみましょう。

家族との再会、友人との集まり、あるいはただ夏のレースを楽しむだけでも、その日の気分は最高です。オフトラック・エンターテイメントの一般入場券とメンバーシップは大変お得で、楽しい一日を過ごすために必要なものがすべて含まれています。アベニューでの無料のピックルボール、ファミリー・ファン・ゾーンでは、インフレータブル、ホビーホース・チャレンジ、カリズマティックによる芝生ゲームなどが楽しめます。

コース沿いにはバーや軽食をご用意。最終レース後はカラウンドラRSLへの無料シャトルバスも運行しています。

貸切会場からトラックサイドの芝生まで、SCTCならホストも簡単です。競馬の伝統。夏の祭典。忘れられない雰囲気。

deals.dealDescription: Celebrate the Boxing Day Races in style with a premium lunch in The Atrium. Enjoy panoramic track views and a refined à la carte experience in the Members Enclosure.
deals.dealInclusions:
Admission to the Racecourse & Members Enclosure 
Entrée & main from our seasonal à la carte menu 
Chef's dessert special available on the day  
Reserved indoor dining table with premium view

_source.productDescription: Kick off Boxing Day with a burst of excitement at Pat's Sapphire Central! Join them for a special 3-hour fossicking event where YOU become the fossicker. Enjoy full access to premium sapphire wash and endless chances to uncover something incredible.

accessibilityAttributes.attributeSubType1IdDescription: Actively welcomes people with access needs.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Offer multiple options for booking - web, email, phone
Offer a range of contact methods for receiving complaints
Employ people with disability
Train your staff in disability awareness
Ask all visitors if there are any specific needs to be met

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Welcomes and assists people who have challenges with learning, communication, understanding and behaviour. (includes people with autism, intellectual disability, Down syndrome, acquired brain injury (ABI), dyslexia and dementia)

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Train your staff in communicating with people with learning or behavioural challenges
Use Plain English / easy read signage and information (includes menus and emergency information)
A quiet space is available at the venue/ facility

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people who are blind or have vision loss.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Provide information in large print
Provide digital communication materials (hard copy information is also available on line)
Train your staff  in customer service for people with vision loss (training would incorporate way finding and communicating with people with vision loss)
Have an appropriate area for toileting an assistance dog

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people who are deaf or have hearing loss.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Train your staff in communicating with people who are deaf or have hearing loss
Staff are trained in Auslan

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people with sufficient mobility to climb a few steps but who would benefit from fixtures to aid balance. (This includes people using walking frames and mobility aids)

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Use floors/coverings which are slip resistant, firm and smooth
Use non-slip tiles in the bathroom or slip resistant matting
Have grab rails in the bathroom
Provide seating in common areas including reception area

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people who use a wheelchair.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Have step free outdoor pathways (includes picnic areas, barbecues and shelters)
Have a doorbell or intercom at an accessible height and display a contact number (accessible height is 900mm-1100 mm)
Have a step free main entrance to the building and/or reception area (includes ramps or slopes with a maximum gradient of 1:14, otherwise are too steep for wheelchairs)
Have step free access to restaurant, lounge and bar
Have doorways which are easy to open and have lever handles (doorways 850mm or wider when open and not heavy)
Have an accessible public toilet which is unlocked
Have a wheelchair accessible toilet / shower and change room
Have wheelchair accessible picnic tables (picnic tables require 720mm knee clearance and 800mm maximum height)
Have at least one wheelchair accessible parking space with wheelchair accessible signage clearly displayed (International standards are 3200mm wide x 2500 mm high)

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people with high support needs who travel with a support person.

productComments.commentText: Kick off Boxing Day with a burst of excitement at Pat's Sapphire Central! Join them for a special 3-hour fossicking event where YOU become the fossicker. Enjoy full access to premium sapphire wash and endless chances to uncover something incredible.
来帕特蓝宝石中心，用一场激动人心的活动开启你的节礼日吧！加入我们，参加为期3小时的特别寻宝活动，你将化身寻宝者，体验寻宝的乐趣。享受顶级蓝宝石清洗服务，更有无限机会发掘令人惊艳的珍宝。

Inizia il Boxing Day con un'ondata di entusiasmo al Pat's Sapphire Central! Unisciti a loro per uno speciale evento di 3 ore dedicato alla ricerca di zaffiri, in cui sarai TU il cercatore. Goditi l'accesso completo al lavaggio premium degli zaffiri e infinite possibilità di scoprire qualcosa di incredibile.

Comece o Boxing Day com muita emoção no Pat's Sapphire Central! Junte-se a eles para um evento especial de garimpo de 3 horas, onde VOCÊ se torna o garimpeiro. Desfrute de acesso completo a um lava-jato de safiras premium e inúmeras chances de descobrir algo incrível.
來帕特藍寶石中心，用一場令人興奮的活動開啟你的節禮日吧！加入我們，參加為期3小時的特別尋寶活動，你將化身尋寶者，體驗尋寶的樂趣。享受頂級藍寶石清洗服務，更有無限機會發掘令人驚豔的珍寶。

Awali Boxing Day dengan keseruan di Pat's Sapphire Central! Bergabunglah dalam acara pencarian batu permata spesial selama 3 jam di mana ANDA menjadi pencarinya. Nikmati akses penuh ke air lelehan safir premium dan kesempatan tak terbatas untuk menemukan sesuatu yang luar biasa.

¡Empieza el Boxing Day con una explosión de emoción en Pat's Sapphire Central! Únete a ellos en un evento especial de búsqueda de 3 horas donde TÚ serás el buscador. Disfruta de acceso completo a un lavado de zafiro premium y un sinfín de oportunidades para descubrir algo increíble.
팻츠 사파이어 센트럴에서 신나는 박싱데이를 시작하세요! 특별한 3시간 사파이어 채굴 이벤트에 참여하여 직접 사파이어를 찾아보세요. 최고급 사파이어 세척 시설을 마음껏 이용하고 놀라운 보석을 발견할 기회를 놓치지 마세요.

Starten Sie den zweiten Weihnachtsfeiertag mit einem aufregenden Erlebnis bei Pat's Sapphire Central! Nehmen Sie an einem dreistündigen Spezial-Event teil, bei dem SIE selbst zum Saphirsucher werden. Genießen Sie die kostenlose Saphirwäsche und unzählige Chancen, einen unglaublichen Fund zu machen.

Célébrez le Boxing Day en beauté chez Pat's Sapphire Central ! Participez à une journée spéciale de prospection de saphirs de 3 heures où VOUS serez le prospecteur. Profitez d'un accès complet à un service de lavage de saphirs haut de gamme et d'innombrables occasions de faire une découverte incroyable.
パット・サファイア・セントラルでボクシング・デーを盛り上げよう！3時間のスペシャル・フォシッキング・イベントに参加して、あなたもフォシッカーになりきりましょう。プレミアムサファイアウォッシュのフルアクセスと、驚きの発見の無限のチャンスをお楽しみください。

_source.productName: Boxing Day Brunch at The Balfour Kitchen and Bar
_source.productDescription:
Boxing Day is the perfect time to relax with loved ones and unwind after the excitement of Christmas.

Enjoy a leisurely à la carte brunch at The Balfour Kitchen and Bar, with a variety of classics and Balfour signatures to suit every taste. Let the team take care of everything so you can simply sit back, relax, and enjoy.
_source.productShortDescription: Boxing Day is the perfect time to relax with loved ones and unwind after the excitement of Christmas.

productComments.commentText:
Boxing Day is the perfect time to relax with loved ones and unwind after the excitement of Christmas.

Enjoy a leisurely à la carte brunch at The Balfour Kitchen and Bar, with a variety of classics and Balfour signatures to suit every taste. Let the team take care of everything so you can simply sit back, relax, and enjoy.

El día después de Navidad es el momento perfecto para relajarse con los seres queridos y desconectar tras el ajetreo navideño.

Disfrute de un brunch a la carta en The Balfour Kitchen and Bar, con una variedad de platos clásicos y especialidades Balfour para todos los gustos. Deje que nuestro equipo se encargue de todo para que usted solo tenga que sentarse, relajarse y disfrutar.

박싱 데이는 크리스마스의 설렘을 뒤로하고 사랑하는 사람들과 함께 휴식을 취하기에 완벽한 시기입니다.

발푸어 키친 앤 바에서 다양한 클래식 메뉴와 발푸어 시그니처 메뉴를 선보이는 여유로운 일품 브런치를 즐겨보세요. 모든 취향에 맞는 메뉴를 제공합니다. 모든 것을 담당 팀에게 맡기시면 편안하게 앉아 휴식을 취하며 즐거운 시간을 보내실 수 있습니다.

Le lendemain de Noël est le moment idéal pour se détendre en famille ou entre amis et décompresser après l'effervescence des fêtes.

Savourez un brunch à la carte en toute tranquillité au Balfour Kitchen and Bar, avec un large choix de classiques et de spécialités Balfour pour satisfaire toutes les envies. Laissez notre équipe s'occuper de tout : installez-vous confortablement, détendez-vous et profitez pleinement de ce moment.

Il Boxing Day è il momento perfetto per rilassarsi con i propri cari e staccare la spina dopo l'emozione del Natale.

Godetevi un brunch à la carte al Balfour Kitchen and Bar, con una varietà di classici e specialità Balfour per tutti i gusti. Lasciate che il team si occupi di tutto, così potrete semplicemente rilassarvi e godervi il momento.

Der zweite Weihnachtsfeiertag ist die perfekte Gelegenheit, mit Ihren Liebsten zu entspannen und nach dem Weihnachtstrubel zur Ruhe zu kommen.

Genießen Sie einen entspannten À-la-carte-Brunch im The Balfour Kitchen and Bar mit einer Auswahl an Klassikern und Balfour-Spezialitäten für jeden Geschmack. Überlassen Sie alles dem Service, damit Sie sich einfach zurücklehnen und genießen können.

节礼日是与亲朋好友放松身心、从圣诞节的喧嚣中解脱出来的绝佳时机。

不妨前往巴尔弗厨房酒吧 (The Balfour Kitchen and Bar) 享用悠闲的单点早午餐，这里提供各式经典菜肴和巴尔弗特色菜，满足您的不同口味。让我们的团队为您安排一切，您只需放松身心，尽情享受即可。

Boxing Day adalah waktu yang tepat untuk bersantai bersama orang-orang terkasih dan melepas lelah setelah kemeriahan Natal.

Nikmati brunch à la carte yang santai di The Balfour Kitchen and Bar, dengan beragam hidangan klasik dan khas Balfour yang sesuai dengan selera Anda. Biarkan tim kami yang mengurus semuanya sehingga Anda dapat bersantai dan menikmati hidangan.

ボクシングデーは、大切な人とくつろぎ、クリスマスの興奮を解き放つ絶好の機会です。

バルフォア・キッチン＆バーでは、様々な定番料理とバルフォア特製料理をご用意し、皆様のお好みに合わせて、ゆったりとアラカルトブランチをお楽しみいただけます。すべてはスタッフにお任せください。お客様はゆったりとくつろぎ、心ゆくまでお楽しみください。

節禮日是與親朋好友放鬆身心、從聖誕節的喧囂中解脫出來的絕佳時機。

不妨前往巴爾弗廚房酒吧 (The Balfour Kitchen and Bar) 享用悠閒的單點早午餐，這裡提供各式經典菜餚和巴爾弗特色菜，滿足您的不同口味。讓我們的團隊為您安排一切，您只需放鬆身心，盡情享受即可。

O Boxing Day é o momento perfeito para relaxar com os entes queridos e descontrair após a agitação do Natal.

Desfrute de um brunch à la carte tranquilo no The Balfour Kitchen and Bar, com uma variedade de pratos clássicos e criações exclusivas do Balfour para todos os gostos. Deixe que a equipe cuide de tudo para que você possa simplesmente relaxar e aproveitar.
